casebody.data:
Douglas TRITES, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
John BRUNEEL, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156814
COA: 340311 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 17, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
